    • Method Detail

      • takeTheExp

        public void takeTheExp()
                throws OperatorException,
                       OperandException,
                       ParanthesisException
        Takes the expression as element by element from the user. In the end, there are some algorithm that checks if input entered wrong. These checks can throw exceptions. Must be careful about that.
        Throws:
        OperatorException
        OperandException
        ParanthesisException

      • Calculate

        public java.util.ArrayList Calculate()
                              throws DivideByZeroException
        Calculates the given expression. Prints the operations and results step by step. Results array of result.
        Returns:
        ArrayList answer. Just an operand
        Throws:
        DivideByZeroException
